document.full_text: around 9,000 disney princess plastic racing tricycles in the united states and 700 in canada have been voluntarily recalled due to a laceration hazard, the two governments said on thursday.
document.title: disney tricycles by kiddieland recalled
lines_and_colors: around 9,000 disney princess plastic racing tricycles in the united states and 700 in canada have been voluntarily recalled due to a laceration hazard, the two governments said on thursday.
